text: Ete kho bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati
edit: Ete kho bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati

translations.transtext: The practice of moderation, monks, not inclining to these both extremes, having been realized by the Buddha; making the wisdom eye [and] insight [happen]; leads to pacification, supreme knowledge, enlightenment, [and] nirvana.
